Text: I have yet to see if it works, but the download speed is fine, 0.5mb/s. Thanks once again for the great upload.

It worked! I beat the game in about an hour or two, it isn't really long but the boss fight is indeed satisfying. Sure as hell is better then the Meredith boss fight :p
If you tried to install this torrent and failed, it means you're doing something wrong because it works perfectly here.

Installed in about 1 sec, and as a result the DA itself works perfectly but there is no legacy content. 

(btw there was no disk1.bin in the torrent)

Using Windows 7 64.
